item.title: Updated Add-on - RearrangeScripts to v201
item.description: RearrangeScripts was updated. Added “About” to the menu of add-on. By this, users can see the help document easily. Add-on GitHub

item.title: Add-on - RearrangeScripts
item.description: RearrangeScripts was published as an add-on application Recently, I have reported RearrangeScripts for rearranging scripts in a GAS project. At that time, I got messages and mails from many developers. They said that you should publish this as an add-on. So, this was released. Now you can search “RearrangeScripts” as an add-on for Spreadsheet. If this is helpful for you, I’m happy. Add-on GitHub Demo
